title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 138 - New York Taxable Income Of A Nonresident Estate Or Trust
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 138 - New York Taxable Income Of A Nonresident Estate Or Trust

State Regulations
§ 138.1 - New York taxable income of a nonresident estate or trust
§ 138.2 - Items in distributable net income
§ 138.3 - Items not in distributable net income
§ 138.4 - Modifications relating to New York items not in distributable net income
§ 138.5 - Repealed
§ 138.6 - Items derived from or connected with New York State sources

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 138

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697

This Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made
by the Tax Reform and Reduction Act of 1987 (Chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987)
and certain other amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
